attributes.action: keep Belmont school a Community Arts College
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Belmont is a successful forward-looking and inclusive school.

Results are consistently above 60% and there is no imperative other than to continue excellent work by school leaders, teachers and staff.

Being forced into ACADEMY status would have serious consequences for all involved with the school. these include:

- Loss of local democracy
- Loss of jobs for teachers
- Fewer opportunities for disadvantaged groups

Please support the staff, students (present and future) and the school as it seeks to continue to develop it's already outstanding successes.

Please sign our petition.

government_responses.details:
